Articles.Content:
> 
> Still silently tweaking things in the background. I have 20 minutes/day time slot for Constellation things, and recently, It's been spant on Altair building, testing, scrapping, and redesigning, as well as ranting for stock 5m parts.

LOL keep going mate!

 I'm so happy I have already made one! And before the offset tools. \*engage smug face\*

That allows me to rest on my laurels a little bit. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-01T21:46:18Z" title="08/01/2015 09:46  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 1, 2015</time> by Majorjim**

So you guys giving up on this?

 I have taken a break due to game performance issues. I know things will be better in unity5 as something said by the devs pricked up my ears. I have recently started building differently so I am going to (*at some point*) rebuild (*sigh*) the whole package. Rebuilding these days is actually super quick so it might not be that far away. 

Anyone else still working on it?
Nope, just lacking some motivation, will eventually return to this. Plus the \*\*^^^\*& overheaing bug.

> 
> Plus the \*\*^^^\*& overheaing bug.

Riight, yeah that is annoying as hell. Has Squad said anything about being fixed?
Dun think so mate, but tey might try to fix it.
Nope, just taking a break. That fairing heating bug has ruined my Orion, and probably the lander aeroshells. @Yukon0009 Almost 2,000 posts! Congrats!
Been sick for a while, too tired to Kerbal. Will get back to the project soon.

> 
> Been sick for a while, too tired to Kerbal. Will get back to the project soon.

Ok Guys. I understand. 

 I am thinking I will completely remake all the craft to reduce part count without sacrificing aesthetics. Sigh.. Anywhoo New craft pack is half way done!

Since I'm not working on it, might as well show a little bit. Old SPR prototype.

![pVOTVIQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/pVOTVIQ.png)

> 
> Since I'm not working on it, might as well show a little bit. Old SPR prototype.
> [http://i.imgur.com/pVOTVIQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/pVOTVIQ.png)

Nice, I love the rovemates.

> 
> Since I'm not working on it, might as well show a little bit. Old SPR prototype.
> [http://i.imgur.com/pVOTVIQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/pVOTVIQ.png)

Ha ha yeah that's awesome!

BUMP!

With 1.1 coming out soon^tm^ I'm getting back started on my Constellation mission pack!

Unfortunately, in that time, my standards for replicas have gone up.  So I'm rebuilding almost everything, starting with...

Altair:

![mm3e2sx.png](http://i.imgur.com/mm3e2sx.png)  

Based on this:

Spoiler

![altair_lsam_ortho__new__by_unusualsuspex](http://orig11.deviantart.net/233b/f/2014/190/1/3/altair_lsam_ortho__new__by_unusualsuspex-d7psu97.jpg)

This,

![lsama.jpg](http://jmm45.free.fr/sondes/altair/lsama.jpg)

And this:

![LSAM_HDRI_3_400x400.jpg30f931ec-45ad-490](http://previewcf.turbosquid.com/Preview/2014/05/25__05_05_48/LSAM_HDRI_3_400x400.jpg30f931ec-45ad-490d-bc27-851fba25a792Larger.jpg)

Gone is the weirdly small airlock and overly visibly strut endpoints.  With it still is the use of ore tanks, and stayputniks.

Cool man. Interesting decision to choose that version of the Altair. I would swap the 'ballast' Stayputs for RCS tanks and use them for ascent. You cannot use rockets anymore as they will destroy the lower stages every time..

 I have already made a massively part reduced version of my Altair using an empty ore tank as a crew cabin. The only thing in the whole pack  that is a problem are those pesky stock fairings. If 1.1 delivers on performance I will just make another custom one I think.

 Good luck with the rest of the build dude.

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, Majorjim said:
> 
> 
> Cool man. Interesting decision to choose that version of the Altair. I would swap the 'ballast' Stayputs for RCS tanks and use them for ascent. You cannot use rockets anymore as they will destroy the lower stages every time..
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  I have already made a massively part reduced version of my Altair using an empty ore tank as a crew cabin. The only thing in the whole pack  that is a problem are those pesky stock fairings. If 1.1 delivers on performance I will just make another custom one I think.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  Good luck with the rest of the build dude.
> 

I've tried the RCS tanks, and they look too small on it.  I'm just going to clip more fuel tanks.  I think I can leave a hole through the lower stage and let the engine fire through that.

Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-17T19:11:29Z" title="03/17/2016 07:11  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 17, 2016</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

> 
> 
> 19 minutes ago, Mad Rocket Scientist said:
> 
> 
> I've tried the RCS tanks, and they look to small on it.  I'm just going to clip more fuel tanks.  I think I can leave a hole through the lower stage and let the engine fire through that.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Thanks!
> 

No worries man.

 Yeah that's a option. Do some test before committing to those engines though. they are super destructive now. And the RCS tanks are about the same size and would not be just empty weight..

OK.

 No more distractions. My shuttle is on hold and my tank tracks project too. I will work on nothing but this until the rebuild is complete.

 I ma looking over the craft again today and they are so cool they really deserve to be given a priority. I will check back in when I am close to release. Good luck chaps!

Is anyone other than myself and [@Mad Rocket Scientist](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/139256-mad-rocket-scientist/) still working on this?

 I have finished the ascent lander and work is going well on the hab lander. I got the parts way down so no single craft has over 400 parts. I just landed the ascent lander on Duna (no shell yet) and sitting on the surface all rovers deployed I get a green/yellow timer. I know this will improve in 1.1 so I am very happy indeed!

 Things to do are the launchers which should not be too hard. The aero-shells which may cause a headache depending on how I decide to make them. DTV is done, under 340 parts with the Orion docked. I am super happy with my progress and the landers look amazing on Duna!

 How you getting on [@Zucal](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/139764-zucal/) @chiken1880 [@DMSP](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/124853-dmsp/)  [@SaturnianBlue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/141267-saturnianblue/) [@Yukon0009](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/109376-yukon0009/) 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-19T19:42:58Z" title="03/19/2016 07:42  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 19, 2016</time> by Majorjim**

Not very well. Real life got in the way and then I lost interest and motivation.

Maybe when 1.1 comes out I will give this a shot again. We will see.

> 
> 
> Just now, DMSP said:
> 
> 
> Not very well. Real life got in the way and then I lost interest and motivation.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Maybe when 1.1 comes out I will give this a shot again. We will see.
> 

I understand man. Ive been working on the rebuild on and off for around 7 months now.. They are time consuming and as you say, life keeps getting in the way..

**EDIT:** *I just read through this thread again. It was so fun when we where all working on this at the same time! I really hope you guys pick it up again soon.* 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-19T21:51:54Z" title="03/19/2016 09:51  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 19, 2016</time> by Majorjim**
Not until 1.1, performance in 1.0.5 for me at least is terrible. I'll try to pick it up as soon as possible, though.

> 
> 
> On 03/20/2016 at 2:39 AM, Yukon0009 said:
> 
> 
> 'll try to pick it up as soon as possible, though.
> 

Glad to hear it man!

 I must be a glutton for punishment.. I can confirm stock proc farings are NOT suitable for an aeroshell.. The many pieces destroy the lander every time. Even with the clamshell mod.. Nuts.. So I will again have to make a custom fairing. I truly hope 1.1 helps!!
